Question: Guangdong Joy Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangdong Joy Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd

Product Highlight: Robotic Vacuum Cleaners

- Produces intelligent sweeping robots, hand-held vacuum cleaners, car vacuum cleaners, tower fans, and ground cleaning tools
- The factory covers over 40,000 square meters with more than 1000 staff, including over 80 technical talents
- Features a sales center, R&D center, large manufacturing center, and testing center
- The manufactory center has robot assembly production base with 9 semi-automatic lean production lines and a monthly production capacity of 30W
- The robot module production base owns 20 production lines for fool-proofing simulation tests
- The testing center covers environment testing center, reliability testing lab, and life test lab to ensure superior product quality
Summary_cn:
广东乐智智能科技有限公司

产品亮点：机器人吸尘器

- 生产智能扫地机器人、手持式吸尘器、汽车吸尘器、塔扇和地面清洁工具
- 厂区占地超过40,000平方米，员工1000余人，其中包括80多名技术人员
- 设有销售中心、研发中心、大型制造中心和测试中心
- 制造中心拥有9条半自动精益生产线的机器人装配生产基地，月生产能力达到30W
- 机器人模块生产基地拥有20条用于防错模拟测试的生产线
- 测试中心包括环境测试中心、可靠性测试实验室和寿命测试实验室，以确保产品质量卓越
